bibl.title: Jews as the Best of All Greeks': Cultural Competition in the Literary Works of Alexandrian Judaeans of the Hellenistic Period.
bibl.note: Positive competition: The Nomos of the Judaeans as the Best Nomos. - Polemical Appropriation: Turning Polemics into an Internal Debate. - Mimetic Project: The Cultural Project of the Alexandrian Poets. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Shifting Social Imaginaries in the Hellenistic Period. Narrations, Practices, and Images

bibl.seg: Sylvie Honigman, 'Jews as the Best of All Greeks': Cultural Competition in the Literary Works of Alexandrian Judaeans of the Hellenistic Period.
Eftychia Stavrianopoulou (ed.), Shifting Social Imaginaries in the Hellenistic Period. Narrations, Practices, and Images = Mnemosyne. Supplementum 363 (Leiden, 2013) pp. 207-232.

Positive competition: The Nomos of the Judaeans as the Best Nomos. - Polemical Appropriation: Turning Polemics into an Internal Debate. - Mimetic Project: The Cultural Project of the Alexandrian Poets. - Conclusion.
